name: Numeruno
description:
Numeruno is a mathematical puzzle platform game.

The object of the game is to clear each board by performing mathematical operations.

You start each board with a value of +1 and must finish with the same value.

Try to complete all 50 boards with the fewest number of operations.

Fans of classic C64 games may notice that the sound effects come from the 1984 game Wizard by Sean A. Moore and Steven Luedders.
